Articles.Content:
(if you don't know what I'm talking about, this is what: click me for a video)

Random Guy: The fastest production car in the world breaks 300 MPH

Elon Musk: Hold my beer

 

But really...like...really? A Tesla Roadster X? Elon's personal car, into space. I guess it was a demo flight of the Falcon Heavy, but you could of at least make it do some cool stuff instead of the battery running out in 12 hours. Also does anyone else think that this is a REALLY good way to dispose of a body? In that mannequin? No?

Anyways, at least there's no traffic. And there is tons of parking spots. Also, imagine trying to sell a car with 80 billion miles on it.

k ill stop now.

 

Edited December 15, 2018 by PewPewTrash
The alternative being a block of concrete, I'm happy with this.

There's no way they hid a body in that mannequin.

Not with a perfectly serviceable trunk that can hold like 6-8.

On 12/15/2018 at 6:46 PM, 5thHorseman said:

There's no way they hid a body in that mannequin.

Not with a perfectly serviceable trunk that can hold like 6-8.

They could have been put in the suit and be immobilized. Could have hidden an oxygen tank inside the car. If we are gunna paint Elon Musk to be a super rich super villain, let’s do it rigth.

Edited December 18, 2018 by munlander1
